body.name: Professional Handheld Steamer for Clothes, Portable Clothing Garment Steamer, Fast Warms Up Multifunction Powerful Steamer Suitable for Home and Travel (H106)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 54 mins
features: [Professional & Quality] The travel steamer is made of high-quality ABS, high-temperature resistant material and double-layer insulation design to prevent scalds, professional transparent water tank with good explosion-proof effect, with professional color box;

[Unique Design] New steamer nozzle is uniquely designed, steams more powerfully and evenly with better wrinkle removal, and the silicone seal design ensures splash-proof, strong steam with remarkable effect;
[Fast-Heating] Fast heats up and emits wrinkle-removing steam in 2 minutes, our garment steamer designed with excellent efficiency, saving your precious time;

[Safe& Reliable] Please turn off the garment steamer when it is not in use and when the water is running out, otherwise it will affect the service life of this steamer. And there is an automatic shut-off function when it gets too hot or water level is too low; it can be safely used in a variety of fabrics;

[Portable Travel] With 130ML(Max Waterline) can be continuously steamed for around 12 minutes; portable steamer with small size design, it can be easily put into the luggage, preventing your clothes wrinkles anytime and anywhere.
body.description: Product Information Parameters Material: ABS Color: white Power: 700~800W Power cord: 2.6M (8.5FT) Voltage: 110~120V/60Hz Product size: 6.3x8.5 inches Water Tank Capacity: 150ml/180ml Max Waterline Capacity: 130ml/160ml Packing list 1 x Garment Steamer 1 x User Manual 1 x Waring Card 1 x Color box Steps to Use: Step 1: When power off status,rotating the nozzle and open it; Setp 2: Fill water and not exceed the MAX waterline; Step 3: Rotating the nozzle to close and power on; Step 4: Press ON button and wait 1-2mins, when emitting steam then ironing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Four Special Features Suitable Fabric Strong Penetrating Power: suitable for a wide range of fabrics, to keep your clothes clean and tidy! Effect Display Superior Wrinkle Remover: to keep your clothes refresh and revive! Travel Companion Perfect Size: very suitable for business trips & vacations! Power Cord Enough Length: to keep you easily enjoy the pleasure of ironing!

Product Information Parameters Material: ABS Color: white Power: 700~800W Power cord: 2.6M (8.5FT) Voltage: 110~120V/60Hz Product size: 6.3x8.5 inches Water Tank Capacity: 150ml/180ml Max Waterline Capacity: 130ml/160ml Packing list 1 x Garment Steamer 1 x User Manual 1 x Waring Card 1 x Color box Steps to Use: Step 1: When power off status,rotating the nozzle and open it; Setp 2: Fill water and not exceed the MAX waterline; Step 3: Rotating the nozzle to close and power on; Step 4: Press ON button and wait 1-2mins, when emitting steam then ironing. Perfect Steamer Feature 1) Automatic shut off; 2) No leaking silicon, seal protection; 3) Exclusive nozzle design; 4) Fast Heating-up within 2 minutes.

Vishui Portable Fabric Steamer-H106 Vishui Portable Fabric Steamer-H110 Vishui Portable Fabric Steamer-H009 Size 8.5"x6.3" 8.5"x6.3" 8.5"x6.3" Weight 1.3 lb 1.3 lb 1.4 lb Water Tank Capacity 150ml 150ml 180ml Max Water Line 130ml 130ml 160ml Heating Time 2 minutes 2 minutes 2 minutes Steam Time Up to 12 minutes Up to 12 minutes Up to 15 minutes

WARINGS 1) Do not tilt the steamer more than 45 degree; 2) Water should not be over the MAX line; 3) The mist is super hot, keep away from the hot steam; 4) Please keep it away from children; 5) Do not leave the stamer unattended when it is working or connected; 6) Use carefully and never turn this unit upside down as there may be hot； 7) Please use distilled or pure water to prevent burning or short-circuting the unit; 8)The fixed voltage is 110V, if you travel abroad, please remember to use a transformer.

WARINGS 1) Do not tilt the steamer more than 45 degree; 2) Water should not be over the MAX line; 3) The mist is super hot, keep away from the hot steam; 4) Please keep it away from children; 5) Do not leave the stamer unattended when it is working or connected; 6) Use carefully and never turn this unit upside down as there may be hot； 7) Please use distilled or pure water to prevent burning or short-circuting the unit; 8)The fixed voltage is 110V, if you travel abroad, please remember to use a transformer.

FAQ 1. Q: Steamer fails to heat, why? A: No power or water,plug it into the power outlet or fill the reservoir with water. 2. Q: No steam, why? A:insufficient water, turn ON/OFF switch to OFF and refill water container. 3. Q: Water sprays from nozzle, why? A: fill too much water over the MAX line,pour some water out until the water level is under the MAX line. 4. Q: It leaks,why? A:Angle tilt! Please adjust and remember not tilt more than 45 degree.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mitey
reviews.reviewText: This thing is small. However don't Be fooled by the size. It takes 15 seconds to start boiling and a pumps out a tremendous amount of steam. I use it on clients when I want to open up the pores of their scalp for Micro-needling treatments. I also use it to steam my face before I do a facial mask. I know I know. I love to sit and watch It bubble away as a tenders back-and-forth, it's kind of funny. It was such a inexpensive item and it works great. And yes, I have actually used it to steam a couple of shirts. It's perfect pack in my kit for work. As I am a hair, makeup and wardrobe stylist. This is a definite buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is small but does great. Light weight and I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No issues for the money
reviews.reviewText: Heats up quick, good amount of steam, although the cord could be longer it still beats getting out an ironing board and setting it up with your iron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Small size but powerful. Warms up fast and knocks the wrinkles out quickly. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not crazy about this steamer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars don’t buy this, invest in something more expensive
reviews.reviewText: spit boiling water everywhere and burned me. now i’ve got to clean up a tsunami of water and still have wrinkles in my clothes. i threw it right in the garbage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great idea for a small personal steamer
reviews.reviewText: Awesome little steamer uses the concept of the little tea kettles for a steamer. I use it in a commercial alteration shop to remove chalk marks from items as well as to smoothen out wrinkles easily fast and at a great price. I have had the larger steamers and either they take 15-plus minutes to warm up the water or they break down. better than iron steamers as well. the best bang for your buck!
